definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同時他也因政府保釋克萊斯勒而被捲入巨大爭議。

sentences.english: But the systematic position of Trimeniaceae is in dispute.
sentences.chinese: 但有關腺齒木科的系統位置存在爭議。

sentences.english: The New York magazine is no stranger to controversial covers.
sentences.chinese: 紐約雜誌對爭議性封面司空見慣。

sentences.english: The flooding reignites one of the key debates over the construction of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 洪災重新引發了就建設三峽大壩的主要爭議之一。

sentences.english: This is the most problematic part of his thesis.
sentences.chinese: 這是他論題中最有爭議的部分。

sentences.english: Article 20 A labor dispute arbitration commission shall have a roster of arbitrators.
sentences.chinese: 第二十條勞動爭議仲裁委員會應當設仲裁員名冊。

sentences.english: The optimal management of femoral fractures in adolescents is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 對於青少年股骨骨折的最佳治療現仍存在爭議。

sentences.english: This precipitated a syncretistic controversy that was to last for many years.
sentences.chinese: 這沉澱一融的爭議，這是持續了很多年。

sentences.english: Obviously he was a controversial historical figure.
sentences.chinese: 總之，馮道是個頗有爭議的歷史人物。

sentences.english: He was nevertheless ordained as bishop of Avila amid growing controversy.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他作爲主教祝聖的阿維拉由於越來越多的爭議。

sentences.english: UniCare Ltd reserves all rights to the final decision on any dispute to this offer.
sentences.chinese: 如有任何爭議，專匯醫療有限公司保留最終決定權。

sentences.english: The treatment of benign giant cell tumors is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 良性鉅細胞瘤的治療爭議比較大。

sentences.english: News of the Exim commitment caused a fuss in some quarters of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 該行的貸款承諾在一些歐洲國家引起了爭議。

sentences.english: Controvercies abound in the finance literature concerning leasing.
sentences.chinese: 和租賃有關的金融文獻中充滿了爭議。

sentences.english: The precise date of the birth and historicity of Jesus are much debated.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌出生的準確日子和歷史性的耶穌有着很多的爭議。

sentences.english: Dual goring and slip-on style for easy no-hassle wear.
sentences.chinese: 雙戈林和風格上滑，容易無爭議的磨損。

definition: to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
